<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Vernai Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2165) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 58</row>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=17)

**Prerequisites**
[Achaekek's Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2162); [Advanced Red Mantis Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=897)

</column>

---

To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) your influence on its death. The DC of this check is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. In addition, add two 5th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook—both spells must be chosen from the following options: [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), [_drop dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=92), [_false vision_](/Spells.aspx?ID=109), [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [_mind probe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), or [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272). You gain a 5th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

<title level="2">Secrets of the Vernai</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 57</row>

The Red Mantis Assassin archetype appears on page 71 of the _Lost Omens World Guide_. Of the additional options below, only Prayer Attack is available freely to Red Mantis assassins without prior permission from the Blood Mistress. Those who dare learn these rare abilities without her permission run the risk of being cast out of the society and hunted down by their former allies. In theory, a daring infiltration of the Crimson Citadel could allow one to study hidden texts and learn these techniques, but the chambers within and below this fortress are among the most dangerous in the region, so such an attempt should not be made lightly!

**Related Feats**: [Achaekek's Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2162), [Fading](/Feats.aspx?ID=2163), [Prayer Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=2164)
name: Vernai Training
prerequisite: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
